Name: Robert H.
AboutMe:
I am a Software Engineer or a Software Developer or a Computer Programmer or whatever they are calling people, these days, that punch computer keys and make software.

I also do a fair bit of software design; but I would not call myself a Software Design Engineer. That is neither in my job description nor in my career goals. I enjoy working in the trenches of the software industry. I build sturdy, robust, efficient and effective systems from horrible, incomplete or missing software design documents. I'm good at 1.) determining what's required, 2.) producing a quality product and 3.) doing so in a timely manor.

I'm a Microsoft guy: c# .net (winforms and webforms), vb6, c++.

I work as an independent contractor. I enjoy it. It's kind of like being The A-Team:

"If you have a problem, if no one else can help, and if you can find them, maybe you can hire...

The A-Team."
